column4: has anyone turned up a solution for problems like https://launchpad.net/bugs/187320 https://launchpad.net/bugs/137734 http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=4336627 that doesn't involve rebuilding ALSA locally?

After N years I just moved from building my own kernel to running the one that Ubuntu ships, and yet cx88-alsa from ubuntu can't talk to snd-pcm from ubuntu, as though they weren't even built from the same tree.
do you realy think we are gonna click and read 3 links to find out what you are talking about ?
I've got an idea for you, maybe next time you can wait more than 30 seconds before you start acting like a COMPLETE FUCKING COCKSUCKER
